title: Were the absent ballot papers returned to some voters as "undelivered "?
subtitle: According to reports from Ohio and Georgia, the mailed ballot papers in envelopes submitted by the Government were rejected by the United States Securities Agency.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: A voter in Chatham district, Georgia, returned a ballot card by post and was listed as "undelivered" although it was intended for the People's Party, which was approved by the province. A box.
